price: Sε wͻdane wͻn ho kͻ asomdwoeε so a, dane woho kͻ so bi, na fa wo ho to Nyankopͻn so, nokorε sε, Ɔne Otiefoͻ a Ɔte biribiara no, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ no.
arabic: ۞ وَإِن جَنَحُواْ لِلسَّلۡمِ فَٱجۡنَحۡ لَهَا وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-in janaḥū lilssalmi fa-ij'naḥ lahā watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
